attributes.action: Legislate to improve road safety during heavy rainstorms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The country is experiencing more and more tropical type localised rainstorms. In order to improve road safety during these events the Highway Code should be changed to state the following:-
All speed limits in affected areas should be reduced by 10mph – Driver liability to comply – No legal liability to change signage. 
Motor vehicles should display dipped headlamps. 
Cycles and other non-motorised transport should display lights.
Overtaking by lorries and vehicles towing trailers should be banned on Motorways and dual carriage ways and such vehicles confined to the inside lane.
All slow moving vehicles and wide loads should stop at the nearest safe refuge.
